changes_from_v1: Removed 5 genuinely dangerous commands (find -delete, systemctl suspend/hibernate, nmcli radio off)
Removed 6 commands that should be BLOCKed (gnome-terminal, screen, python http.server)
Removed 6 commands with template placeholders (<file_name>, <username>, etc.)
Extended with LLM-generated commands covering developer workflows, text processing, system info, and more
Added 8 new DANGEROUS_PATTERNS to extraction filter to prevent future leaks
Fixed system path patterns to use word boundary (\b) instead of trailing slash, preventing bypass of /etc, /var etc. filter
